mapper.select: select b.* from ( select a.* ,rownum rm from (SELECT p.*,pc.text from t_product p , t_productcategory pc where p.productcategoryid = pc.id order by sales ) a where rownum <=#{end} ) b where b.rm >#{start}
select count(*) from t_product p , t_productcategory pc where p.productcategoryid = pc.id
select count(*) from t_parameter p , t_productcategory pc where p.productcategoryid = pc.id

select b.* from ( select a.* ,rownum rm from (SELECT p.*,pc.text from t_parameter p , t_productcategory pc where p.productcategoryid = pc.id order by orders ) a where rownum <=#{end} ) b where b.rm >#{start}
select count(*) from t_attribute p , t_productcategory pc where p.productcategoryid = pc.id

select b.* from ( select a.* ,rownum rm from (SELECT p.*,pc.text from t_attribute p , t_productcategory pc where p.productcategoryid = pc.id order by propertyindex ) a where rownum <=#{end} ) b where b.rm >#{start}
select count(*) from t_specification s , t_product p where s.productsid = p.sn
select b.* from ( select a.* ,rownum rm from (SELECT s.* from t_specification s , t_product p where s.productsid = p.sn order by s.spename ) a where rownum <=#{end} ) b where b.rm >#{start}
select count(*) from t_productnotify p ,t_member m ,t_product pr where p.memberid=m.memberid and p.productid=pr.sn

select * from (select a.*,rownum rn from (select p.*,m.username,pr.name from t_productnotify p ,t_member m ,t_product pr where p.memberid=m.memberid and p.productid=pr.sn order by p.hassent ) a where rownum <=${end} ) where rn >${start}
